modName: Sisters of Light - Fantasy Mage Followers
summary: 4 mage followers to help you on your quests! Misha, Naomi, Penelope & Savana are waiting for you at the Sleeping Giant Inn. UNP + CBBE Compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[b]After years of training, anticipating and waiting, the Dragonborn has finally arrived in Skyrim! [/b]
[b]
Disguised as traveling healers, the sisters of light are exalted to finally be able to fulfil their true destiny; protecting you. Strategically positioned in Riverwood, between Helgen and Whiterun, they hope to intercept you before any further harm can find you.[/b]

[b]CHARACTERS:[/b]
[u][b]Misha[/b]
[/u]Power: Frost
Hair: Platinum
Eyes: Light Blue
Height: 0.9500
Weight: 0

[u][b]Naomi
[/b][/u]Power: Frost
Hair: Black
Eyes: Dark Blue
Height: 0.9750
Weight: 33
[i]
[/i][u][b]Penelope
[/b][/u]Power: Shock
Hair: Brown
Eyes: Green
Height: 1.000
Weight: 66

[b][u]Savana
[/u][/b]Power: Fire
Hair: Auburn
Eyes: Dark Green
Height: 1.0250
Weight: 100

[b][u]IMPORTANT NOTES!!!
[/u][/b]Characters use the base vanilla body and textures so they will work with anything you may have already installed. However, I believe that the Ancient Greek Armor is for UNP only. [b][i]You can use the reduced requirements version (1.0B) if you would like to use the mod with CBBE.[/i]
[/b]
>>>For the mod to work as intended, you will need a body (UNP or CBBE) + Textures<<<

I use UNP -->[b] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/[/b]
+ Demonic Textures (Fair skin complexion selections) -->[b] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834[/b]
or you can use Fair Skin Complexion -->[b] [/b][b]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602[/b]/

Along with:
Race Menu --> [b]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624[/b]
EFF (to support multiple followers and access follower racemenu) --> [b]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/[/b]

As well as the following overlays (to customize individual followers):
Race Menu Overlay Compilation UNP -->[b] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48705
[/b]Hieroglyphs Pubic Hair Overlays -->[b] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89735[/b]
author: mikeallan
